æˆ‘ç®€å•å¡«äº†ä¸‹èµ„æ–™ï¼Œç„¶åŽè®©æ”¯ä»˜ 249 ï¼Œè¿˜æ²¡ä»˜ï¼Œé—®é—®å¤§å®¶ï¼Ÿ çœ‹ä»–çš„ faq app.rns.id/faq FAQ What is a â€œSovereignty-Backed Identification Cardâ€? A legally valid identification card issued by a sovereign nation. We issue both a digital identification on the blockchain and a physical ID card for customers who have passed our screening process.
When can I receive my ID card? Your Digital ID will be issued once your application has been officially approved. Your physical ID card will then be created and sent to the address you provided. Depending where you live, shipping times for the physical card may vary.
What is RNS? RNS (Root Name System) is the digital identity platform developed to support the application and issuance of sovereignty-backed digital IDs.
What are my payment options? We use Stripe in our checkout process which accepts most international credit cards and Alipay.

entry.title: Precise Timing With Web Animations API
entry.summary: In JavaScript, itâ€™s natural to reach for timers when something is to happen on time. But when something is to happen at the exact moment because other things depend on it, you quickly learn timers are more of a problem than a solution. They are never on time, really. Web Animations API could eliminate the need for timers in certain cases while being precise.
